title: Dubai Luxury Real Estate Hits $10 Billion in 2025 Sales – Russians & Indians Lead Buying Spree
shortdescription: Palm Jumeirah mansions average $25M as crypto millionaires flood the market.
description: Dubai breaks all records with $10B+ in luxury property sales — Palm Jumeirah, Emirates Hills, and Downtown see 300% YoY price surge driven by Russian oligarchs and Indian HNIs.
author: Property Expert

title: Tokyo Apartment Prices Hit All-Time High – $1M for 500 Sq Ft in Shibuya
shortdescription: Japan ends 30-year property slump as foreign funds pour into Tokyo real estate.
description: Central Tokyo now averages $2,000/sqft — surpassing Manhattan. Warren Buffett's recent Japan investments spark massive foreign buying wave.
author: Property Expert

title: Miami Condo Market 2025: Experts Warn of 40% Price Crash Incoming
shortdescription: 4,000+ unsold luxury units and rising insurance costs spell disaster.
description: Miami has highest condo inventory in America — 24 months of supply. Hurricane insurance premiums up 400% since 2022 forcing distressed sales.
author: Property Expert

title: BlackRock Buys 100,000 U.S. Homes in 2025 – Single-Family Rental Empire Grows
shortdescription: World’s largest asset manager now owns more homes than any landlord in history.
description: BlackRock partners with Invitation Homes and American Homes 4 Rent to acquire entire new subdivisions before they hit retail market.
author: Property Expert
